"Truly a local, non-corporate feel. This is the little island authentic place that we were looking for."
Dave R.
"We transferred from the bar to our table and our server was also great!"
Kim P.
"We loved the food. We had a good time, service was fantastic !! We loved it. We went twice while staying at Sanibel. "
Adele H.
"We come to Sanibel twice a year and eat here multiple times each trip. Our favorite restaurant on the island."
Lara D.
"The food was great. It is a hopping place. Would definitely go back ! Busy for a Wednesday afternoon which is always a good sign !!"
Fran B.
"Were we surprised after we got our food this is a true diamond in the rough and perfect example of not judging a book by its cover."
Katy F.
"The Lazy Flamingo is a small bar with a few tables inside and outside but the grouper sandwich was the best I have had on Sanibel! "
Tina C.
"This is pretty good. The portions were very generous. Wait time was minimal. Food came out pretty quickly."
Gary O.
"Amazing food, great service. We will stop here again on our next trip to Sanibel. Kid friendly too."
Mandi P.
"If you want great food and a great time and you’re on Sanibel Island, this is the perfect place for you to go! "
Barry L.

Santiva Menu Coming Soon
SHUCKED TO ORDER
Coldest on the Island
ICE COLD OYSTERS ON THE HALF SHELL
We serve them ice cold and juicy
½ Dozen - Baker’s Dozen
CLAMS ON THE HALF SHELL
We serve them small, cold and juicy
½ Dozen - Baker’s Dozen
THE POT
It’s one of Larry’s favorites!
This is 2 dozen select oysters or clams or combo, steamed in beer with special spices,
celery and onions, all in their own fresh juices
Oysters -  Clams  -   Combo
PEEL & EAT SHRIMP
The sweetest, pinkest, beer-steamed, bouncy prawns you ever tasted! 
Served hot with cocktail sauce and lemon.
SMOKED FISH
We don’t know what kind of wood - we just know it good! Served with tartar sauce
CONCH CHOWDER
That’s what you dunk the fritters in! Little on the spicy side!
CLAM CHOWDER
New England Style, tasty and creamy
CONCH FRITTERS
(Remember it KONK!)
Just like hush puppies or clamcakes, but they’re chock full of queen conch, diced vegetables, lime and cocktail sauce
MUSSELS MARINARA
It’s an island favorite - topped with Parmesan cheese, 
Served with Flamingo Garlic Bread - the best!
CLAMS MARINARA
It’s topped with Parmesan cheese, Served with Flamingo Bread - the best!
FRIED SHRIMP
Plump, pink, prawns with our house breading. Served with fries, cocktail sauce and lemon
FRIED  OYSTERS
Fresh select oysters breaded and fried to perfection. Served with fries, cocktail sauce and lemon
GROUPER OR CATCH OF THE DAY SANDWICH MESQUITE- GRILLED OR FRIED
Our own unique seasoning, lettuce, tomato, onion, tartar 
sauce on a fresh baked roll, served with fries
FRIED GROUPER BASKET
Same great filet as the sandwich, just a little more and no bun, served with a mound of fries.
MESQUITE-GRILLED GROUPER OR CATCH OF THE DAY PLATTER
A larger filet with romaine lettuce, sliced tomato, and a side of french fries
MESQUITE-GRILLED RIBS
Grilled to perfection with our own special seasoning and served with coleslaw and fries. 
BBQ sauce, if you must
MESQUITE-GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST SANDWICH
Boneless, skinless, plump and juicy, with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo, and our special sauce on a fresh baked roll, served with fries
FRIED CHICKEN TENDERS SANDWICH SANDWICH
Chicken tenders fried to perfection and served on a bun with all the trimmings and fries
YOUR CATCH
Your fresh fish - you catch it, you filet it, you clean it, we cook it, - Blackened, grilled, mesquite grilled or fried. Sandwich or platter comes with all the trimmings and fries.
Max 10oz. Per Order 10.99
BUFFALO WINGS
Fresh - Never Frozen
Mild, Hot, Teriyaki, or Teri-Hot served with celery and blue cheese - The Very Best!
DEAD PARROT WINGS
We call them that because they’re so hot, they could raise the dead! 
Comes with celery and blue cheese (Order at your own risk! Very, Very, Hot!)
BIG BURGER BURGER
8oz. ground sirloin, char-grilled, dressed with tomato, lettuce, onion, pickles, mayo and our special sauce on a fresh bun, served with fries
STEAK SANDWICH
6oz. of top beef sirloin done to your liking on our garlic bread 
with tomato, lettuce, onion, and served with fries
CAESAR SALAD
Ask anyone who has tried our Award-winning Island Favorite - You won’t need to know anymore! Topped with Parmesan cheese and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread
CAESAR SALAD WITH MESQUITE-GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST
Our same Award-winning Caesar Salad with our same Mesquite-Grilled Chicken Breast
and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread
CAESAR SALAD WITH MESQUITE-GRILLED GROUPER OR CATCH OF THE DAY
Our same Award-winning Caesar Salad with our same Mesquite-Grilled Catch
 and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread
FRENCH FRIES
Our same Award-winning Caesar Salad with our same Mesquite-Grilled Catch
 and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread
FLAMINGO GARLIC BREAD
Our same Award-winning Caesar Salad with our same Mesquite-Grilled Catch
 and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread
DESSERTS
KEY LIME PIE
An Old Florida Favorite
DAILY DESSERT SPECIALS
The Best Desert On The Island
ICE COLD BEER
Coldest on the Island
DOMESTIC DRAFTS
(NON ALCOHOLIC)
PREMIUM DRAFTS
DOMESTIC PITCHERS
BOTTLES LONGNECKS
PREMIUM PITCHERS
CRAFT IPA DRAFTS & CRAFT IPA PITCHERS
PREMIUM BOTTLES
HOUSE SELECT WINES
By The Glass or Bottle
WHITES
Chardonnay   -   Pinot Grigio -       White Zinfandel
REDS
Cabernet Sauvignon - Merlot
CHAMPAGNES
DOMAINE CARNEROS BRUT
Yeasty and creamy on the palate with a citrus, pear and green apple midpalate and a long finish
PIPER SONOMA
Light refreshing aromas of citrus, pear, and peaches followed with the nuance of spice
CRISTALINO BRUT
YAGO SANTIVA SANGRIA
SARATOGA SPARKLING WATER
BOTTLE WATER
SERVING COKE PRODUCTS - COFFEE - ICE TEA
Free Refill
*Warning*
Consuming raw or undercooked meat, fish, seafood, shellfish, poultry, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness. THIS IS NOT A GLUTEN-FREE RESTAURANT
There is a risk with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach, blood, or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk consult a physician.
All fried items are fried in 100% Peanut Oil
Florida Law - No Smoking. Please be courteous with cell phones. No Vaping Allowed.

Sauteed shrimp over linguini tossed with tomato, garlic, basil, olive oil and white wine. Topped with parmesan cheese, served with Flamingo Garlic Bread.

8oz. ground sirloin, char-grilled, dressed with tomato, lettuce, onion, pickles, mayo and our special sauce on a fresh bun, served with fries
BUFFALO & BLUE  CHEESE BURGER

There is a risk with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach, blood, or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk consult a physician.

ABOUT US
ABOUT US
Lazy Flamingo started as a local secret that turned into something so much more. Our original location was on Santiva, the space between Sanibel and Captiva Islands. Our bright pink building and unique island seafood brought the local community together. Fast forward decades, and we now have four locations in total; Santiva, Sanibel, Fort Myers, and Bokeelia. Our style is simple but unique, serving fresh seafood and cold drinks. We continually improve both our restaurants and menu, adding new exciting items. Our style is all our own,
creating
a refreshing take on a laid-back island dining experience. Our success has been solely due to our customers, and in that spirit, we have given back through fundraisers and different charity events. We want to thank everyone for the continued support for all these years and for many more years to come.
ABOUT US
Lazy Flamingo started as a local secret that turned into something so much more. Our original location was on Santiva, the space between Sanibel and Captiva Islands. Our bright pink building and unique island seafood brought the local community together. Fast forward decades, and we now have four locations in total; Santiva, Sanibel, Fort Myers, and Bokeelia. Our style is simple but unique, serving fresh seafood and cold drinks. We continually improve both our restaurants and menu, adding new exciting items. Our style is all our own,
creating
a refreshing take on a laid-back island dining experience. Our success has been solely due to our customers, and in that spirit, we have given back through fundraisers and different charity events. We want to thank everyone for the continued support for all these years and for many more years to come.

"Truly a local, non-corporate feel. This is the little island authentic place that we were looking for."
Dave R.
"We transferred from the bar to our table and our server was also great!"
Kim P.
"We loved the food. We had a good time, service was fantastic !! We loved it. We went twice while staying at Sanibel. "
Adele H.
"We come to Sanibel twice a year and eat here multiple times each trip. Our favorite restaurant on the island."
Lara D.
"The food was great. It is a hopping place. Would definitely go back ! Busy for a Wednesday afternoon which is always a good sign !!"
Fran B.
"Were we surprised after we got our food this is a true diamond in the rough and perfect example of not judging a book by its cover."
Katy F.
"The Lazy Flamingo is a small bar with a few tables inside and outside but the grouper sandwich was the best I have had on Sanibel! "
Tina C.
"This is pretty good. The portions were very generous. Wait time was minimal. Food came out pretty quickly."
Gary O.
"Amazing food, great service. We will stop here again on our next trip to Sanibel. Kid friendly too."
Mandi P.
"If you want great food and a great time and you’re on Sanibel Island, this is the perfect place for you to go! "
Barry L.

SHUCKED TO ORDER
Coldest on the Island
ICE COLD OYSTERS ON THE HALF SHELL
We serve them ice cold and juicy
½ Dozen - Baker’s Dozen
CLAMS ON THE HALF SHELL
We serve them small, cold and juicy
½ Dozen - Baker’s Dozen
THE POT
It’s one of Larry’s favorites!
This is 2 dozen select oysters or clams or combo, steamed in beer with special spices,
celery and onions, all in their own fresh juices
Oysters -  Clams  -   Combo
PEEL & EAT SHRIMP
The sweetest, pinkest, beer-steamed, bouncy prawns you ever tasted! 
Served hot with cocktail sauce and lemon.
SMOKED FISH
We don’t know what kind of wood - we just know it good! Served with tartar sauce
CONCH CHOWDER
That’s what you dunk the fritters in! Little on the spicy side!
CLAM CHOWDER
New England Style, tasty and creamy
CONCH FRITTERS
(Remember it KONK!)
Just like hush puppies or clamcakes, but they’re chock full of queen conch, diced vegetables, lime and cocktail sauce
MUSSELS MARINARA
It’s an island favorite - topped with Parmesan cheese, 
Served with Flamingo Garlic Bread - the best!
CLAMS MARINARA
It’s topped with Parmesan cheese, Served with Flamingo Bread - the best!
FRIED SHRIMP
Plump, pink, prawns with our house breading. Served with fries, cocktail sauce and lemon
FRIED  OYSTERS
Fresh select oysters breaded and fried to perfection. Served with fries, cocktail sauce and lemon
GROUPER OR CATCH OF THE DAY SANDWICH MESQUITE- GRILLED OR FRIED
Our own unique seasoning, lettuce, tomato, onion, tartar 
sauce on a fresh baked roll, served with fries
FRIED GROUPER BASKET
Same great filet as the sandwich, just a little more and no bun, served with a mound of fries.
MESQUITE-GRILLED GROUPER OR CATCH OF THE DAY PLATTER
A larger filet with romaine lettuce, sliced tomato, and a side of french fries
MESQUITE-GRILLED RIBS
Grilled to perfection with our own special seasoning and served with coleslaw and fries. 
BBQ sauce, if you must
MESQUITE-GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST SANDWICH
Boneless, skinless, plump and juicy, with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo, and our special sauce on a fresh baked roll, served with fries
FRIED CHICKEN TENDERS SANDWICH SANDWICH
Chicken tenders fried to perfection and served on a bun with all the trimmings and fries
YOUR CATCH
Your fresh fish - you catch it, you filet it, you clean it, we cook it, - Blackened, grilled, mesquite grilled or fried. Sandwich or platter comes with all the trimmings and fries.
Max 10oz. Per Order 10.99
BUFFALO WINGS
Fresh - Never Frozen
Mild, Hot, Teriyaki, or Teri-Hot served with celery and blue cheese - The Very Best!
DEAD PARROT WINGS
We call them that because they’re so hot, they could raise the dead! 
Comes with celery and blue cheese (Order at your own risk! Very, Very, Hot!)
BIG BURGER BURGER
8oz. ground sirloin, char-grilled, dressed with tomato, lettuce, onion, pickles, mayo and our special sauce on a fresh bun, served with fries
STEAK SANDWICH
6oz. of top beef sirloin done to your liking on our garlic bread 
with tomato, lettuce, onion, and served with fries
CAESAR SALAD
Ask anyone who has tried our Award-winning Island Favorite - You won’t need to know anymore! Topped with Parmesan cheese and served with Flamingo Garlic Bread

*Warning*
Consuming raw or undercooked meat, fish, seafood, shellfish, poultry, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness. THIS IS NOT A GLUTEN-FREE RESTAURANT
There is a risk with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach, blood, or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk consult a physician.
All fried items are fried in 100% Peanut Oil
Florida Law - No Smoking. Please be courteous with cell phones. No Vaping Allowed.
